title: Inlay in the Form of a Woman
description:
Flat, light brown or deep yellow ivory plaque in the form of a standing, naked woman, who raises both arms to her coiffure; in front view. Details drawn in black; design incised. Plaque is very thin; front well smoothed.
Condition: Good; slightly worn at right foot; a few discolorations in dark brown on front and back. Back is scratched as if by a tool.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
